thread.title: BRIEF-Oriental University City Holdings Hk Says HY Profit Attributable RMB14.7 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Oriental University City Holdings Hk Says HY Profit Attributable RMB14.7 Mln

organizations.name: brief-oriental university city holdings hk says hy
oriental university city holdings hk ltd

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Oriental University City Holdings Hk Ltd :
* INTERIM DIVIDEND OF HK5.0 CENTS PER SHARE HAS BEEN DECLARED
* ‍HY PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE RMB14.7 MILLION, DOWN 15.7%​ * HY ‍REVENUE RMB33.3 MILLION, UP 0.5%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
